title: Is the Goerli testnet deprecated already?  I can't get Geth and Prysm to sync.
body:
I've been trying to get a Goerli execution and consensus running to practice staking withdrawal.  Is the Goerli testnet deprecated already?  I can't get Geth and Prysm to sync.  I keep getting the message in Geth logs, `Beacon client online, but never received consensus updates. Please ensure your beacon client is operational to follow the chain!`.  Beacon is indicating connection the localhost Geth endpoint.
My execution for Geth docker-compose is:
```
version: "3"
services:
  geth:
    image: ethereum/client-go:v1.13.2
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "30303:30303"
      - "30303:30303/udp"
      - "8545:8545"
      - "8551:8551"
      - "8546:8546"
    volumes:
      - /mnt/goerli-pv/geth-pv:/geth
      - /home/ubuntu/secret/:/var/lib/jwtsecret
    stop_signal: SIGINT
    stop_grace_period: 2m
    command:
      - --goerli
      - --config
      - /geth/goerli.toml
      - --http
      - --http.api
      - "eth,net,engine,web3"
      - --authrpc.jwtsecret
      - "/var/lib/jwtsecret/goerli-secret"
      - --authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0
      - --authrpc.port=8551
      - --authrpc.vhosts=*
      - --http.addr=0.0.0.0
      - --http.vhosts=*
      - --http.corsdomain=*
      - --ws
      - --ws.origins=*
      - --ws.addr=0.0.0.0
      - --ws.api
      - "eth,net,engine,web3"
      - --graphql
      - --graphql.corsdomain=*
      - --graphql.vhosts=*
      - --datadir
      - "/geth"
      - --syncmode=snap
```
goerli.toml:

My consensus for Prysm is:
```
docker run --rm -d -v /mnt/goerli-pv/beacon-pv:/data -v /home/ubuntu/prysm/genesis.ssz:/genesis/genesis.ssz -v /home/ubuntu/secret:/var/lib/jwtsecret -p 4000:4000 -p 13000:13000 -p 12000:12000/udp --network="host" --name beacon-node gcr.io/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain:v4.0.8 --datadir=/data --rpc-host=0.0.0.0 --grpc-gateway-host=0.0.0.0 --monitoring-host=0.0.0.0 --execution-endpoint=http://localhost:8551 --jwt-secret=/var/lib/jwtsecret/goerli-secret --suggested-fee-recipient=0xDxxxxmywalletxxxx --genesis-state=/genesis/genesis.ssz --goerli --accept-terms-of-use
```
